description.Information: Rice is a staple food in many countries.
description.instruct: Soak the seeds in warm water for 8-12 hours, then sow into moist soil.

description.Information: Corn is a popular crop that provides food for humans and animals.
description.instruct: Soak corn seeds in warm water for 6-8 hours, then sow them about 2-3 cm deep.

description.Information: Potatoes are a rich source of starch.
description.instruct: Cut seed potatoes into pieces, then plant them in loose soil.

description.Information: Cassava is a tropical crop that provides starch.
description.instruct: Plant cassava cuttings by placing them in the soil.

description.Information: Beans are rich in protein and nutrients.
description.instruct: Sow bean seeds in moist soil, ensuring adequate light and regular watering.

description.Information: Leafy greens are a popular vegetable rich in nutrients.
description.instruct: Sow seeds in moist soil, water daily, and expect germination in 3-5 days.

description.Information: Water spinach is a common vegetable in Vietnam.
description.instruct: Sow water spinach seeds directly into the soil and water daily.

description.Information: Carrots are rich in vitamin A and fiber.
description.instruct: Sow carrot seeds about 1 cm deep in the soil and water regularly.

description.Information: Cabbage is a common vegetable in everyday dishes.
description.instruct: Sow cabbage seeds in nutrient-rich soil and water regularly.

description.Information: Amaranth is easy to grow and rich in vitamins and minerals.
description.instruct: Sow amaranth seeds in loose soil and water daily.

description.Information: Mango is a tropical fruit rich in vitamins.
description.instruct: Remove the mango seed husk, sow it in moist soil, and ensure ample sunlight.

description.Information: Avocado is a fruit rich in healthy fats and nutrients.
description.instruct: Place the avocado seed in water until it sprouts, then plant it in soil.

description.Information: Lemons are a fruit that provides high vitamin C.
description.instruct: Sow lemon seeds in soil, place in a well-lit area, and water regularly.

description.Information: Watermelon is a summer fruit with a high water content.
description.instruct: Sow watermelon seeds in soil, water regularly, and place in bright sunlight.

description.Information: Jackfruit is a tropical fruit with a sweet flavor.
description.instruct: Sow jackfruit seeds directly in the soil; the plants thrive in a moist environment.

description.Information: Roses symbolize love and beauty.
description.instruct: Soak rose seeds in warm water, then sow in soil and keep moist.

description.Information: Chrysanthemums are often used for festivals and decoration.
description.instruct: Sow chrysanthemum seeds directly into the soil, water daily, and keep moist.

description.Information: Orchids symbolize elegance.
description.instruct: Sow orchid seeds in a cool environment, and water lightly.

description.Information: Lotus symbolizes purity and innocence.
description.instruct: Sow lotus seeds in water, suitable for ponds.

description.Information: Sunflowers are bright yellow, symbolizing faith.
description.instruct: Sow sunflower seeds directly into the soil, water regularly, and place in sunlight.

description.Information: Celosia flowers have bright colors and unique shapes.
description.instruct: Sow celosia seeds in well-drained soil, water lightly.

description.Information: Carnations symbolize love and fascination.
description.instruct: Sow seeds in nutrient-rich soil, water regularly, and ensure good drainage.

description.Information: Basil is a common herb used in cooking.
description.instruct: Sow basil seeds in moist soil, water regularly, and ensure sunlight.

description.Information: Mint is fragrant and commonly used in tea and desserts.
description.instruct: Sow mint seeds in well-drained soil and water regularly.

description.Information: Thyme is a versatile herb used in many cuisines.
description.instruct: Sow thyme seeds in light soil, keep it moist, and ensure sunlight.

description.Information: Rosemary is known for its aromatic flavor.
description.instruct: Sow rosemary seeds in dry soil, and ensure sunlight.

description.Information: Oregano is often used in Italian cuisine.
description.instruct: Sow oregano seeds in well-drained soil and water lightly.

description.Information: Cilantro adds flavor to many dishes.
description.instruct: Sow cilantro seeds in light soil and water regularly.

description.Information: Chili peppers add heat to various dishes.
description.instruct: Sow chili seeds in well-drained soil and keep warm.

description.Information: Garlic is used for flavor and health benefits.
description.instruct: Plant garlic cloves in loose soil, pointy side up.

description.Information: Ginger adds flavor and has medicinal properties.
description.instruct: Sow ginger rhizomes in moist soil, keeping them warm and well-drained.

description.Information: Turmeric is known for its health benefits and flavor.
description.instruct: Plant turmeric rhizomes in moist soil, keep them warm, and water regularly.

description.Information: Cumin seeds add flavor to various dishes.
description.instruct: Sow cumin seeds in light soil and keep it moist.

description.Information: Saffron is a valuable spice used in many cuisines.
description.instruct: Sow saffron corms in well-drained soil, water lightly.

description.Information: Fennel has a distinct flavor and is used in various dishes.
description.instruct: Sow fennel seeds in rich soil and keep it moist.
